Name: Greater Accra
Description: The capital region, home to the nation s capital, Accra, and the heart of the country s economy and culture.

Name: Ashanti
Description: Located in the central region of the country, known for its rich history, culture, and the Ashanti Kingdom.

Name: Western
Description: Known for its gold-rich lands, coastal beauty, and the capital city, Sekondi-Takoradi.

Name: Central
Description: A region located on the southern coast, known for its historic forts, beautiful beaches, and agriculture.

Name: Volta
Description: A region located in the eastern part of Ghana, known for its mountainous terrain and cultural diversity.

Name: Eastern
Description: Located in the southeastern part of Ghana, known for its agricultural activities, forests, and historical sites.

Name: Northern
Description: A region in the northern part of Ghana, known for its vast savannah, wildlife, and historical heritage.

Name: Upper West
Description: A region in the northwest, known for its rich agricultural lands and traditional culture.

Name: Upper East
Description: Located in the northeastern part of the country, known for its cultural heritage and being close to the borders with Burkina Faso.
